While the music-exec-turned-TV-producer didn't share his specific thoughts about Jennifer Lopez or the oddly entertaining Steven Tyler , he gave them a positive review overall.

State of the Union edition time pubdate datetime=" 2011-01-27T17:14:24-05:00"> Mike Pence won't run for president, but will likely run for IN governor Indianapolis Star on the news that will disappoint some national conservatives: U.S. Rep. Mike Pence shut the door today on a run for the presidency, but left wide open the likelihood that he'll seek a different office: Governor of Indiana. " In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana," Mike Pence , R-Columbus, said of himself and wife Karen in a letter being sent to supporters."

in Turkey, returned to the U.S. to have a lesion surgically removed from his right leg, spurring rumors he will retire. Allen Iverson denies this, as he wrote on his Twitter account: I have never said anything about retirement, nor have I said goodbye to the game of basketball. Once I get past this, my plan is to continue playing at the highest level possible. So don't put me in my rocking chair just yet. Hold on, I'll be back! It's not yet known if the lesion is benign or not, or if it's a cyst. Allen Iverson , 35, is expected to be out for several weeks

. In practice, Andy Coulson made up his mind before Christmas that he would have to go." Andy Coulson was running at 70 per cent of his capacity- at best," says one ally. He wasn't prepared to work on that basis. David Cameron and George Osborne tried hard to dissuade him from stepping down.
